comment.author: 30520254@N03
comment._content: .. In fact , "Ministère de la marine " means Ministry of the NAVY ..and in this time , it was exactly  "Ministère de la marine et des colonies ".. (  Navy administrated the overseas territories  at the begginnig of 1900  just before the creation of a "ministère des colonies ")   Todays this building is officially the  NAVY HQ..in Paris
